page.title: 13LOCAL HISTORY CHURCH WINDOWS
page.content: The creation window. The creation window is the oldest window at the east end of the south aisle.It has been dated about 1200 but restored in 1830.This tells the story of the creation,the fall,the murder of Abel and the beginning of the story of the flood which is continued on the Noah window next to it.The body of the window represents the creation of the world by Christ and shows in detail the story of Adam and Eve.The upper part of the window is occupied by the nine different degrees of angelic power.
